mapper.insert: insert into group_question (group_name, creater_name, create_time, type_id) values (#{name}, #{createrName}, #{createTime}, #{typeID})
mapper.select: select count(u.wrong_num) as w, count(u.right_num) as r from group_question g inner join ug_collect_middle u on g.group_id=u.group_id where g.type_id=#{typeID} and u.user_id = #{userID}
select u.wrong_num as w, u.right_num as r, u.user_id as userID, u.group_id as groupID, u.done_time as time from ug_collect_middle u where u.user_id = #{id} order by u.done_time
select u.user_id as userID, u.random_id as randomID, u.done_time as time, u.right_num as r, u.wrong_num as w from ur_middle u where user_id = #{id};
